_instructions: Copy this file to config.json and fill in your values
_gemini_instructions: Optional - get free API key from https://makersuite.google.com/app/apikey
_confidence_comment: Minimum confidence for prediction acceptance (0.0-1.0). Lower = more sensitive, higher = more selective
_smoothing_comment: Number of frames for temporal averaging. Higher = smoother but slower response
_stability_comment: Consecutive frames required before committing prediction. Higher = more stable but slower
_camera_comment: Camera indices to try in order (varies by system)
_motion_comment: Enable temporal feature extraction (recommended for accuracy)
_motion_window_comment: Frames for motion signature computation (10 = 333ms @ 30 FPS)
_two_hand_comment: Track both hands (recommended, required for two-hand signs)
_buffer_comment: Maximum words to keep in sentence before truncating
_grammar_rate_comment: Rate limit for grammar API (respect free tier limits)
_tuning_tips: Lower confidence_threshold (0.25) for more detections but more false positives
Increase stability_frames (25+) for very stable but slower detection
Disable motion_signature for faster inference on weak hardware (accuracy will drop)
Adjust smoothing_window based on signing speed (faster = lower value)
